title: UK Charming Aylesbury Retreat North of London with Onsite Restaurant & Health Club
description: Venture to where the air is fresher with a quaint stay at the charming Holiday Inn Aylesbury, an IHG Hotel. Sink into a relaxing rural retreat boasting a calming indoor pool, a restaurant perfect for unwinding with your favourite drink in hand, an onsite Starbucks and a well-equipped health club. Outside, discover the historic cobbled streets of Market Square, travel back to your childhood at the Roald Dahl Museum and Story Centre or see majestic creatures at the Whipsnade Zoo.
location_description: Holiday Inn Aylesbury, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: New Road, Weston Turville, Aylesbury, HP22 5QT, United Kingdom
